Attribute.Name: ChangeInOrderedQty
Attribute.Description: Change in Ordered Quantity due to quantity addition/removal.

Description.div: This element gives the information about the status from which quantity is canceled. This element is not returned for delivery lines.

Attribute.Name: NumberOfWorkOrders
Attribute.Description: Number of work orders generated for this order line.

Description.div:
The ConsiderCurrentSlot flag indicates that system should consider the available capacity of the current slots, which the current timestamp falls under.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N
The quantity requested in the work order's volume unit of measure, which is specified in the VolumeUOM field of the work order
The quantity requested in the work order's weight unit of measure, which is specified in the WeightUOM field of the work order
Flag indicates if this record has been changed by this transaction

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Number of Added Awards on the Order Line.

Attribute.Name: IsPromotionOnOrder
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the Award was created for a Promotion on the order.

Attribute.Name: IsPromotionOnOrderLine
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the Award was created for a Promotion on the order line.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Number of Removed Awards on the Order Line.

Attribute.Name: IsPromotionOnOrder
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the Award was created for a Promotion on the order.

Attribute.Name: IsPromotionOnOrderLine
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the Award was created for a Promotion on the order line.

Attribute.Name: ChangeInTotalAmount
Attribute.Description: Change in Total Amount due to price attributes change.

Attribute.Name: CreateUserName
Attribute.Description: Name of the user who created the audit.

Attribute.Name: ModifyUserName
Attribute.Description: Name of the user who modified the audit.

Attribute.Name: ReasonCode
Attribute.Description: Reason Code

Attribute.Name: ReasonText
Attribute.Description: Reason Text

Attribute.Name: ModificationLevel
Attribute.Description: Level at which modification is done. Order, Order_Line, Order_Release or Order_Release_Line.

Attribute.Name: ModificationLevelScreenName
Attribute.Description: Screen Name for the Modification level.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemID
Attribute.Description: Substituted ItemID. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemUOM
Attribute.Description: Substituted Item UOM. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted.

Attribute.Name: Action
Attribute.Description: Action

Attribute.Name: AuditType
Attribute.Description: Audit Type

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Description: Name of the ID

Attribute.Name: Value
Attribute.Description: Value of the ID

Attribute.Name: Extended
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the attribute is an extended field. If this attribute is not available, then it means the attribute is not extended.

Attribute.Name: ModificationType
Attribute.Description: Modification Type used for changing the attribute

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Description: Name of the Attribute Changed

Attribute.Name: NewValue
Attribute.Description: New Value of the attribute modified

Attribute.Name: OldValue
Attribute.Description: Old Value of the attribute modified
